Create List
kw.doc: Returns a list containing given items.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: options_prop
kw.msg: Get LATEST chromedriver version for google-chrome
Get LATEST chromedriver version for google-chrome

kw.name: Run Keyword If
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.
Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Get Browser Ids
kw.doc: Returns index of all active browser as list.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Append To List
kw.doc: Adds ``values`` to the end of ``list``.

kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'Welcome. Please wait while we connect with an agent.'.
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.
Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.arg: Does the page contain expected text? ${page_contains}
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Fail
kw.arg: Expected text: ${exp_text} not found in the page text: ${page_text}
kw.doc: Fails the test with the given message and optionally alters its tags.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.arg: Expected text: ${exp_text} found in the page text: ${page_text}
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.
